meanings.sent1: The idea of a flying pig is implausible.
meanings.sent2: It is implausible that a unicorn exists in real life.
meanings.sent3: It would be implausible to see a penguin flying in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The thought of a talking tree is as implausible as a talking rock.
meanings.sent5: The concept of time travel for humans remains implausible.

meanings.definition: Unlikely to be true or to happen
meanings.sent1: Winning the lottery twice is implausible.
meanings.sent2: It is implausible that aliens have visited Earth.
meanings.sent3: It seems implausible that a cat would walk a dog.
meanings.sent4: The idea of finding a pot of gold at the end of a rainbow is as implausible as finding a unicorn.
meanings.sent5: The chances of a snowstorm in summer are implausible.
